author: martin hislop I designboom
title: equus bass 770 luxury muscle car
text:
equus bass 770 luxury muscle car feb 28, 2017 equus bass 770 luxury muscle car 

one boutique manufacturer in michigan has developed a luxury interpretation of the classic muscle car . the equus ‘bass 770′ is a powerful luxury vehicle that combines timeless-styling with a contemporary sense of prestige. 
all images © equus automotive 


the equus ‘bass 770’s exterior design appears to draw influences from a number of the best muscle car manufacturers: the elegant silhouette, roofline, and fastback are all similar to the 1960’s ford ‘mustang'; the front-profile is like a sleek 1970’s chrysler combined with two dodge ‘SRT hellcat’ headlamps; and the tail recognizes late 1960’s chrysler vehicles. 


the ‘bass 770’s’ power comes courtesy of a supercharged 6.2 litre ‘LS9′ V8 engine from the chevrolet ‘corvette ZR1′, paired with a six-speed manual gear box. this combination creates performance figures like a ferrari ‘458 spider’, producing a quite frightening 640 horsepower with 605 lb.ft of torque, allowing it to accelerate from 0 – 60 mph (0 – 96 km / h) in just 3.4 seconds, hitting its top speed at 200 mph (321 km/h). these figures are boosted by its lightweight aluminum chassis, with a ‘superformed aluminum body’ , plus carbon fiber inners enhancing structural strength. 


the handcrafted interior architecture of this muscle car pays hommage to the classics while integrating innovative features. sat next to the retro-styled steering is a touch screen with USB connvectivity + satellite navigation built into its leather covered console. the dark luxurious interior is highlighted with shiny metal and aluminum elements. for a premium, a designer creates a bespoke interior with just about any color, or interior refinement.
